results.content: The author does not respond to any questions you ask.  I looked at all the Q&A and no response for years!

results.content:
Actually this course deserves 5 stars at least hasn't it been for the somewhat disappointing start. I am suggesting the instructor includes clearer info re linking the code to the database as well as how to include the code in a folder then fire it up to the local server. I have also found the fact he is coding in sublime then copying and pasting to another IDE confusing at the beginning. These remarks are not meant to undermind the knowledge nor the beautiful effort of the instructor, these are rather comments from a learner and learning perspective but can make all the difference during this course journey.  Looking forward to seeing the rest of the videos.

Thanks.

results.content: Good course overall but there are a few videos missing. Also could've been done better without using that Cloud based system he used and instead setup Apache, install PHP and use an editor to make changes as that whole copy and paste was not very ideal. I like this guy though, he was friendly, enthusiastic and overall learned quite a few things here.
